stories.Title: Olympiad-level problem solving
stories.Description: According to Google DeepMind, the key to developing more robust AI systems in the future lies in them excelling at mathematical reasoning. AlphaGeometry serves as proof of this statement.
stories.Tweet: Olympiad-level problem solving 📦 According to Google DeepMind, the key to developing more robust AI systems in the future lies in them excelling at mathematical reasoning. AlphaGeometry serves as proof of this statement. #google https://techcrunch.com/2024/01/17/deepminds-latest-ai-can-solve-geometry-problems/

stories.Title: Based on you
stories.Description: Sam Altman stated in a recent interview that the continuous development of AI might lead to "uncomfortable" decisions as the technology transitions into a more customizable tool.
stories.Tweet: Based on you 📦 Sam Altman stated in a recent interview that the continuous development of AI might lead to "uncomfortable" decisions as the technology transitions into a more customizable tool. #ai https://www.axios.com/2024/01/17/sam-altman-davos-ai-future-interview

stories.Title: Inspired by nature
stories.Description: Sakana, a Japanese startup, has proudly raised $30 million to boost its ideas. Their focus is on small AI models that can work together seamlessly, bypassing the need for gigantic models.
stories.Tweet: Inspired by nature 📦 Sakana, a Japanese startup, has proudly raised $30 million to boost its ideas. Their focus is on small AI models that can work together seamlessly, bypassing the need for gigantic models. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/tokyo-startup-sakana-ai-lands-30m-to-forge-new-path-with-compact-ai-models/

stories.Title: As seen on TV
stories.Description: Amazon is providing a creative gateway for its Fire TV users in the US. Fueled by the Titan Image Generator, they can now create stunning TV backgrounds with AI.
stories.Tweet: As seen on TV 📦 Amazon is providing a creative gateway for its Fire TV users in the US. Fueled by the Titan Image Generator, they can now create stunning TV backgrounds with AI. #amazon https://techcrunch.com/2024/01/17/amazon-brings-its-ai-powered-image-generator-to-fire-tv/

stories.Title: Great news from Stability AI
stories.Description: Stability AI has unveiled Stable Code 3B, a model that, despite its compact size, can outperform larger rivals like Meta's CodeLLaMA 7B with its capabilities for code completion.
stories.Tweet: Great news from Stability AI 📦 Stability AI has unveiled Stable Code 3B, a model that, despite its compact size, can outperform larger rivals like Meta's CodeLLaMA 7B with its capabilities for code completion. #ai https://venturebeat.com/programming-development/stability-ai-releases-stable-code-3b-to-fill-in-blanks-of-ai-powered-code-generation/

stories.Title: Just a few moments away
stories.Description: Japan is getting ready for a close encounter with the moon as the SLIM lander begins to enter a lower, near-circular lunar orbit for its landing attempt this Friday.
stories.Tweet: Just a few moments away 📦 Japan is getting ready for a close encounter with the moon as the SLIM lander begins to enter a lower, near-circular lunar orbit for its landing attempt this Friday. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/japans-slim-spacecraft-lowers-orbit-ahead-of-friday-moon-landing-attempt/

stories.Title: Next stop, the ISS
stories.Description: Although everything was already set for Axiom Space's Ax-3 crewed mission, it has been announced that the launch has been delayed until tomorrow. Stay tuned for details!
stories.Tweet: Next stop, the ISS 📦 Although everything was already set for Axiom Space's Ax-3 crewed mission, it has been announced that the launch has been delayed until tomorrow. Stay tuned for details! #spacex https://www.space.com/spacex-ax-3-astronaut-mission-go-for-launch

stories.Title: Taking the lead
stories.Description: It's been a rollercoaster lately for Apple; however, there's something to celebrate as the company has surpassed Samsung for the first time in global shipments, with 234.6 million units in 2023.
stories.Tweet: Taking the lead 📦 It's been a rollercoaster lately for Apple; however, there's something to celebrate as the company has surpassed Samsung for the first time in global shipments, with 234.6 million units in 2023. #apple https://www.engadget.com/apple-ends-samsungs-decade-plus-as-global-smartphone-shipment-leader-121413711.html

stories.Title: Another one, please!
stories.Description: Mazda is the latest automaker to embrace Tesla's charging standard. This move differs from other announcements as they haven't stated a specific date for it, since Mazda is yet to offer EVs in the US.
stories.Tweet: Another one, please! 📦 Mazda is the latest automaker to embrace Tesla's charging standard. This move differs from other announcements as they haven't stated a specific date for it, since Mazda is yet to offer EVs in the US. #mazda https://electrek.co/2024/01/16/mazda-nacs-adoption-tesla-superchargers/

stories.Title: Going with the flow
stories.Description: In an effort to stay competitive with the constant changes in the EV market, Tesla has cut prices for its Model Y in Europe.
stories.Tweet: Going with the flow 📦 In an effort to stay competitive with the constant changes in the EV market, Tesla has cut prices for its Model Y in Europe. #tesla https://electrek.co/2024/01/17/tesla-joins-vw-and-byd-in-cutting-prices-in-germany/

title: DeepMind presents AlphaGeometry, Sam Altman's vision for AI, Apple takes the lead
description: Google is always pushing AI boundaries, and in their own words, mathematical reasoning is the next big thing for AI development. Following that vibe, Sam Altman considers that AI development might make us "uncomfortable" at some point because of how customizable it may get to every individual. Plus, a big shout-out to Apple! They've officially knocked Samsung off its long-standing throne in global shipments. Cheers to that!
